info.name: Event Now - Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Event Now application including Authentication, Place Categories, Places, Ratings, Favorites, and Bookings

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT token on success.

Get profile of currently logged-in user. Requires JWT token.
Update user name and/or email. Requires JWT token.
Change user password. Requires current password and JWT token. Returns new token.
Test invalid login credentials - should return 401 error
Test registration with existing email - should return 400 error

Test with invalid token - should return 401 error
